lines.text: Are you an aficionado of flamenco dancing?
I was until I found out Jose Greco was born in Brooklyn!

[McQueen chases perps to a dead end]
Police! Up against the wall.

[to Catarato]
Man, why are we running from this old man here?

[Translated from Spanish]
I know him. He's crazy.

[McQueen approaches with gun drawn]
Up against the wall.

[McQueen slams Pepe's face against the brick wall]
A broken nose is better than a broken life. Entiendo?

[Nose broken and bleeding]
Yeah, I speak English. I speak English.
[Catarato points a gun to the forehead of Logan McQueen]
What are you doing, man? You can't shoot a cop.
